en.title: Aggregation Service
en.content: Aggregation Service generates a <% summary-report %> with noisy aggregated data and runs in a <% trusted-execution-environment %>

en.title: Trusted Execution Environment
en.content: Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) provides a level of assurance for data integrity, data confidentiality, and code integrity.

en.title: Summary Report
en.content: A report that contains aggregated data that has random noise applied for privacy
